title: Käte Hamburger Kolleg
text: Meeting Study Group: Translation 10 Jan. 2011, 04:15 p.m. – 05:45 p.m. Location: SH 1/187 Colloquium Colloquium: Research Field 2 10 Jan. 2011, 06:15 p.m. – 07:45 p.m. Location: GA 8/34 Meeting Meeting of the KHK-Board 13 Jan. 2011, 12:00 p.m. – 03:00 p.m. Location: SH 1/189 Lecture Dr. Hildegard Piegler: "Von den 'hautes Sciences' zur Esoterik" 13 Jan. 2011, 04:15 p.m. – 05:45 p.m. Room: SH 1/187 Meeting Research Field 3: Conference Preparation 17 Jan. 2011, 04:15 p.m. – 07:45 p.m. Location: SH 1/187 Meeting Focus Group Secret 24 Jan. 2011, 04:15 p.m. – 05:45 p.m. Location: SH 1/187 Meeting Meeting of the RUB-Colleagues 24 Jan. 2011, 06:15 p.m. – 07:45 p.m. Location: SH 1/187 Details: professors, research assistants of the KHK in German language Meeting Meeting of all Käte Hamburger Kolleg's Management 25, – 26 Jan. 2011, Lecture Prof. Dr. Roberto Hofmeister Pich: John Duns Scotus on the Credibility of Christian Doctrines 26 Jan. 2011, 10:15 a.m. – 11:45 a.m. Location: HMA 40 Meeting Preparation of "Beiratssitzung" (08./09.02.11) 31 Jan. 2011, 04:15 p.m. – 05:45 p.m. Location: SH 1/187 Details: Fellows, KHK-steering committee, KHK research assistants Colloquium Colloquium: Short reports of the Fellows / Refreshment 31 Jan. 2011, 06:15 p.m. – 07:45 p.m. Location: GA 8/34
